Package de.systemagmbh.tools.io

Provides classes for system input and output through data streams, serialization and the file system.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
CSysDiaryFileWriter Customer - Requirement: They want to log Strings to a daily file.
CSysFile An enhanced File.
CSysFileFinderDir This class searches for Files within directory structures.
CSysFileFinderZip This class allows the search for files within Jar and Zip archives.
CSysFileProcessorController A CSysFileProcessorController gets all Files that fulfill from all Subdirectories certain criteria.
CSysFileTool The class CSysFileTool provides some useful methods for file handling.
CSysTableWriter CSysTableWriter writes a ISysTableModel on a PrintWriter or into a file; Useful for creating Excel importable Textfiles or dumping on screen etc.
 

Package de.systemagmbh.tools.io Description

Provides classes for system input and output through data streams, serialization and the file system.
